body.name: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Hyaluron Plump Hydrating Shampoo for Dehydrated, Dry Hair Infused with Hyaluronic Acid Care Complex, Paraben-Free, 26.5 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 26 mins
features: 72H Intense Moisture: Hydrating Shampoo gently cleanses, instantly hydrates, and replumps dry hair for up to 72 hours, without weigh down, when used with Hyaluron Plump Hair Care system. Moisturizing shampoo for bouncy, shiny, free-flowing hair

Hair Products Inspired by Skincare: Expertly formulated with Hyaluronic Care Complex to replenish moisture and provide 72H hydration. From the number 1 Skincare Serum Brand - L'Oreal. Freshly scented with berries, cherry blossom, vanilla and sandalwood

Hydrating Routine for Dry and Dehydrated Hair: Gently cleanse with paraben-free Elvive Shampoo, prime with Flash Hydration Wonder Water, then apply hair conditioner to detangle and moisturize. Finish with Replumping Serum to revitalize hair

Custom Hair Care Solutions for All Hair Types: From expertly formulated hair treatments, masks and serums to nourishing leave-in conditioners and frizz-defying shampoo and conditioner, we've got what you need

L'Oreal Paris Innovation: We are a total beauty care company that combines the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in hair color, hair care, hair style, skin care and cosmetics
body.description: Elvive Hyaluron + Plump paraben-free hydrating formulas help achieve shinier, free-flowing strands for dry, dehydrated hair without weigh down. Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid, Elvive Hyaluron + Plump regimen, inspired by skincare, helps hair fibers retain long-lasting moisture. Hydrating Shampoo gently cleanses and instantly hydrates while the Hydrating Conditioner instantly detangles and moisturizes dry hair. The Wonder Water provides flash hydration for soft, weightless hair, and the replumping serum, with 2 percent Hyaluronic Care Complex, serves as a daily moisturizing leave-in, giving a full boost of moisture to dry hair and leaving hair bouncier and shinier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great so lovely. Scent stays on hair for long time. 5 stars all the way around. Makes my hair so soft and easy to brush. Adds nice shine to my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite product
reviews.reviewText: To start off, the plum scent is amazing the quality of product really provides a shine, soft and revitalized result to your hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This smells amazing. It may just be the best smelling shampoo I've ever used. It's kind of fruity and fresh. It also leaves my hair squeaky clean, no tangles and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Decided to try this shampoo for it's hydrating for dry hair claims and for it's reasonable price. Have been using for a few days and have noticed a difference in my hair. My hair isn't as dry as with other brands like Garnier Fructis. My hair doesn't fall out as much when I brush it once it has dried. So I figured out some of it was falling off when brushing due to dryness. I'd recommend for those who have hair on the dry side and not the greasy or oily side. I also like the scent, subtle but clean smelling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shampoo to get hair super clean and add volume.
reviews.reviewText: I have used so many expensive salon and big name shampoos looking for one that deeply cleans and also gives my hair some volume without stripping it. And to think, the one I like best is under $4.00 a bottle! This shampoo lathers fine and gets my hair very clean. It gets rid of all my styling products and root spray and leaves it feeling soft. The conditioner of the same name adds amazing hydration and, together, they give me clean, shiny, and volumized hair that isn't weighed down or looking fried. I am really happy with this shampoo (and the conditioner) and I plan on using it for the foreseeable future. I haven't found anything better and I have been looking for decades. I have color treated, fine hair that gets weighed down very easily and can look pretty shabby if not babied. Although this shampoo is inexpensive, it sure doesn't perform cheaply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it, smells soooo good
reviews.reviewText: Makes my hair feel soft and sleek, and detangles my curls. The smell is yummy! It does better on my curly hair than the Loreal Elvive line (still great, tho). I have tried several L'Oreal shampoos, conditioners, and make-up products over the last 30 years and have yet to be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Omg!! My hair is gorgeous!!
reviews.reviewText: Shiny, hydrated and dare I say bouncy?!!?!Perimenopause left my hair dry and frizzy, and I thought I just had to deal. Not so. I just needed this shampoo! Smells amazing and will definitely get the conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Eh... there are better L'Oreal products
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter who said that it wasn't that great and didn't do much for the friz. Figured I'd give it a try-- she's right. I like the smell, but not much moisturizing, and my hair wasn't very soft afterwards. I didn't get any "plumping". The other L'oreal styles have worked better, for the same money.
I saw a lot of people saying it was good, so I wanted to buy it to try. The smell is very good, after using the hair is also very smooth
This was a really good product
